query: SELECT id, title, level, modules FROM courses WHERE framework LIKE '%ISO%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT id, title, level, modules FROM courses WHERE framework LIKE '%ISO%';

rows.title: ISO 42001 AI Management System Fundamentals
rows.modules: [{"description": "Understand the history, purpose, and structure of ISO 42001. Learn why AI governance requires a dedicated management system standard and how ISO 42001 aligns with other frameworks.", "duration": 150, "title": "Introduction to ISO 42001"}, {"description": "Identify internal and external issues affecting the AIMS. Determine interested parties and their requirements. Define the scope of an AIMS.", "duration": 150, "title": "Context of the Organization (Clause 4)"}, {"description": "Explain leadership responsibilities in AIMS. Develop an AI policy statement. Define organizational roles and responsibilities. Establish governance structures for AI.", "duration": 150, "title": "Leadership and Governance (Clause 5)"}, {"description": "Conduct AI risk assessments. Set AI objectives aligned with organizational goals. Perform AI system impact assessments. Plan actions to address risks and opportunities.", "duration": 180, "title": "Planning and Risk Assessment (Clause 6)"}, {"description": "Identify resource requirements for AIMS. Ensure competence and awareness of personnel. Establish communication processes. Manage documented information.", "duration": 150, "title": "Support and Resources (Clause 7)"}, {"description": "Implement operational controls for AI systems. Manage the AI system lifecycle. Ensure data governance and quality. Oversee third-party AI relationships.", "duration": 180, "title": "Operation and AI System Lifecycle (Clause 8)"}, {"description": "Monitor and measure AIMS performance. Conduct internal AIMS audits. Perform management reviews. Analyze and evaluate AI system performance.", "duration": 150, "title": "Performance Evaluation (Clause 9)"}, {"description": "Implement continual improvement processes. Handle nonconformities and corrective actions. Prepare for ISO 42001 certification. Understand the certification audit process.", "duration": 150, "title": "Improvement and Certification (Clause 10)"}]
